conbody.p: The following lists show the order of precedence that Euca2ools commands use to retrieve the URL, region name, and access key values when running commands.

section.title: URL and Region Name Order of Precedence

ol.li: The --url parameter specified with the command
Configuration file for region given with --region
Configuration file for region given with EUCA_REGION environment variable
The --url parameter specified with the command
Configuration file for region given with --region
Configuration file for region given with EUCA_REGION environment variable
Configuration file settings for user/region given with --region
Configuration file settings for region given with EUCA_REGION environment variable
Configuration file settings for the default user and region
Configuration file settings for user/region given with --region
Configuration file for region given with EUCA_REGION environment variable
Configuration file settings for the default user and region
